c74object.name: trork.drum-trigger
c74object.digest: Remap pitches on incomming midi to nearest allowed pitch
c74object.description: Remap pitches on incomming midi to nearest allowed pitch.

method.name: tempo
method.digest: Set the tempo of the Live Set
method.description: Set the tempo of the Live Set.

method.name: float
method.digest: The playing position in the Live Set, in beats
method.description: The playing position in the Live Set, in beats.

attribute.name: offset
attribute.digest: Offset the beats time from the Live Set
attribute.description: Offset the beats time from the Live Set.
